steps: Update version in templateDetails.xml and updates.xml
git add . && git commit -m 'Bump version to X.X.X'
gh release create minimalista-vX.X.X --title 'Minimalista Template vX.X.X' --notes 'INLINE_NOTES'
version_update_protocol.release_notes_template:
## Minimalista Template vX.X.X
### New Features & Improvements
• [improvements]
### Target Compatibility
• Joomla 3.8+: Full backward compatibility maintained
• Joomla 4.x: Enhanced compatibility and performance
• Joomla 5.x: Improved robustness and error handling
Full Changelog: https://github.com/uzielweb/minimalista/compare/minimalista-vPREV...minimalista-vX.X.X

rules: ALWAYS use gh CLI for releases
NEVER create temporary files for release notes
ALWAYS push commits before creating tags
ALWAYS update both templateDetails.xml AND updates.xml

template_structure.assets: Custom CSS/JS via Web Asset Manager
